table.name: vtiger_bhsagentreport
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsagentreport` ( `bhsagentreportid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsagentreport_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsagentreportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsagentreportcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsagentreportcf` ( `bhsagentreportid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsagentreportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
